doc:
Gay Autterson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gay_Autterson 0 Gay Autterson (also professionally credited as Gay Hartwig and Gay Autterson Hartwig) is an American voice actress who has done voice-overs for animated television series by Hanna-Barbera. She is mostly known as the voice of Betty Rubble for several of The Flintstones spin-off series and specials throughout the 1970s and early 1980s such as The Pebbles and Bamm-Bamm Show, The Flintstone Comedy Hour, The New Fred and Barney Show, Fred and Barney Meet The Thing and The Flintstone Comedy Show. Gay_Autterson ( also_professionally_credited as Gay_Hartwig and Gay_Autterson_Hartwig ) is an_American_voice_actress who has_done voice-overs for animated_television_series by Hanna-Barbera . She is_mostly_known as the_voice of Betty_Rubble for several of The_Flintstones_spin-off_series_and_specials throughout the_1970s and early_1980s such_as The_Pebbles_and_Bamm-Bamm_Show , The_Flintstone_Comedy_Hour , The_New_Fred and Barney_Show , Fred and Barney_Meet_The_Thing and The_Flintstone_Comedy_Show .
